channel.title: math.AC updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.AC updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Galois Theory
item.description: arXiv:2408.07499v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: These are the notes for an undergraduate course at the University of Edinburgh, 2021-2023. Assuming basic knowledge of ring theory, group theory and linear algebra, the notes lay out the theory of field extensions and their Galois groups, up to and including the fundamental theorem of Galois theory. Also included are a section on ruler and compass constructions, a proof that solvable polynomials have solvable Galois groups, and the classification of finite fields.
item.dc:creator: Tom Leinster

item.title: Determinants of Hodge-Riemann forms and simplicial manifolds
item.description: arXiv:2408.02737v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: We calculate the determinant of the bilinear form in middle degree of the generic artinian reduction of the Stanley-Reisner ring of an odd-dimensional simplicial sphere. This proves the odd multiplicity conjecture of Papadakis and Petrotou and implies that this determinant is a complete invariant of the simplicial sphere. We extend this result to odd-dimensional connected oriented simplicial homology manifolds, and we conjecture a generalization to the Hodge-Riemann forms of any connected oriented simplicial homology manifold. We show that our conjecture follows from the strong Lefschetz property for certain quotients of the Stanley-Reisner rings.
item.dc:creator: Matt Larson, Alan Stapledon

item.title: Non-noetherian GL-algebras in characteristic two
item.description: arXiv:2408.04630v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: Over fields of characteristic two, we construct an infinite ascending chain of GL-stable ideals in the coordinate ring of infinite skew-symmetric matrices. This construction provides the first known example of a non-noetherian GL-algebra, thereby resolving a long-standing open question in the area. Our results build on the work of Draisma, Krasilnikov, and Krone.
item.dc:creator: Karthik Ganapathy
